scripts.build: npm run disc && npm run dist
scripts.docs: documentation -f html -o docs support/docgen.js && documentation -f md support/docgen.js > API.md
scripts.dist: browserify index.js | uglifyjs > dist/tonal.min.js&& ls -hall dist/
scripts.update: rm -rf node_modules/tonal.* && npm i && npm dedupe
scripts.climate: npm run coverage && npm run codeclimate
